title: Iranian Authorities Crack Down on Protests at Tehran Apartment Complex
description: Iranâ€™s security forces shot at windows and threw stun grenades in a raid at the Shahrak Ekbatan complex, where a member of the feared Basij militia was killed last week, residents said.
dc:creator: Farnaz Fassihi
media:description: Iranians protest the death of 22-year-old Mahsa Amini in Tehran on Thursday. Ms. Amini died after she was detained by the morality police.
